Introduction
This topic contains information on eligibility requirements for a child, including
circumstances under which VA may pay additional benefits for a child
additional benefits for a child not living with the claimant
, and
effect of a child’s entry into active duty
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A - Establishing a Child’s Age and Relationship
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A
